about_the_game:
In this game you play as an experienced paranormal investigator. Fate has brought you to one of these places - an abandoned school for boys.
On the way you will need to look for keys from the doors, notes from the staff and those who studied here. And also find screamers and learn the history of students and their mentors.

Game features:
- The game contains images of violent scenes that can have a negative impact on the psyche;
- The game features flashing lights of varying intensities and bright lights;
- The game is made on Unreal Engine 5;
- The gameplay is close to realism;
- Explore an abandoned school;
- Find out what happened to its students;
- Find all the notes of the children as well as the staff;
- The soundtrack will immerse you in the world, conveying the madness.

And remember, this is not the end!
The game will continue to come out chapter after chapter!
